    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act​(java.util.List<Life> newDisease,
                EnvironmentConditions environmentConditions)
        This method acts out what the disease does every step. It reproduces, gets older and when it reaches its time, trys to kill its host.
        Specified by:
        act in class Life
        Parameters:
        newDisease - The list of new diseases that are created are added to this list.
        environmentConditions - An instance of EnvironmentConditions that tells the disease what the time and weather currently is.

      • infect

        public void infect​(java.util.List<Life> newDiseases)
        This method attemps to infect the surrounding Animals and Plants.
        Parameters:
        newDisease - The list of new diseases that are created are added to this list.

      • attemptKill

        protected void attemptKill()
        Attemps to kill the victim. The disease either successfully kills the victim causing it to have no host and so dying its self or the victim is cured of the Disease causing the Disese to die, either way the Disease will die.

      • kill

        protected void kill()
        Kills the victim

      • attemptInfection

        protected boolean attemptInfection​(AnimalPlant potentialVictim)
        Returns whether the disease succesfully infects a chosen victim.
        Parameters:
        potentialVictim - The AnimalPlant that the disease is trying to infect.
        Returns:
        true if the infection is succesfull, false if it fails.
